channel.title: Comments for Travel Monster
channel.description: Just another WP Travel Engine Demos Sites site

item.title: Comment on Hello world! by A WordPress Commenter
item.dc:creator: A WordPress Commenter
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://en.gravatar.com/">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Comment on Experience the Incredible India by Teresa J. Caruso
item.dc:creator: Teresa J. Caruso
item.description: My mum and I did a 1-day hiking tour near Kathmandu with Joel. He is an amazing and experienced guide and above all very kind person. The hike was very nice, but what we liked the most was Joel company. We highly recommend him when going to any tour by WP Travel Engine Adventure. Also, the owner Joel is very nice and professional. Joel knows what Western travelers want and need. He is intelligent, informative and wise.
item.content:encoded: My mum and I did a 1-day hiking tour near Kathmandu with Joel. He is an amazing and experienced guide and above all very kind person. The hike was very nice, but what we liked the most was Joel company. We highly recommend him when going to any tour by WP Travel Engine Adventure. Also, the owner Joel is very nice and professional. Joel knows what Western travelers want and need. He is intelligent, informative and wise.

item.title: Comment on Bhutan Cultural Tour: Explore the Himalayan Kingdom by Joe Jonas
item.dc:creator: Joe Jonas
item.description: I did the Annapurna circuit trek with WP Travel Engine Adventure, with John as my guide. He was recommended to me by a friend. John really made the trip so wonderful, he had all the details down to a tee, he was very accommodating and knowledgeable, as well as being a true professional he is also so genuine and great fun! I also felt his insight into the country was really interesting.
item.content:encoded: I did the Annapurna circuit trek with WP Travel Engine Adventure, with John as my guide. He was recommended to me by a friend. John really made the trip so wonderful, he had all the details down to a tee, he was very accommodating and knowledgeable, as well as being a true professional he is also so genuine and great fun! I also felt his insight into the country was really interesting.

item.title: Comment on Romantic Sri Lanka Honeymoon Package by Sunita Sharma
item.dc:creator: Sunita Sharma
item.description: Sunrise is the most beautiful and basecamp sunrise should be a must if you\'re in the area. Did the Annapurna Circuit with Nepal Eco Adventure and cannot recommend Joel and his team highly enough. Joel knows what Western travelers want and need. He is intelligent, informative, wise, careful and a mine of information about Nepal, its history, and customs.
item.content:encoded: Sunrise is the most beautiful and basecamp sunrise should be a must if you\’re in the area. Did the Annapurna Circuit with Nepal Eco Adventure and cannot recommend Joel and his team highly enough. Joel knows what Western travelers want and need. He is intelligent, informative, wise, careful and a mine of information about Nepal, its history, and customs.

item.title: Comment on Maldives: The Travel and Experience of the Lifetime by Harry Styles
item.dc:creator: Harry Styles
item.description: Sunrise is the most beautiful and basecamp sunrise should be a must if you\'re in the area. Did the NYC trip with Eco Adventure and cannot recommend Joel and his team highly enough. Joel knows what Western travelers want and need. He is intelligent, informative, wise, careful and a mine of information about USA, its history, and customs.
